price: 33਼ ਬੇਸ਼ੱਕ ਉਹ ਅੱਲਾਹ ਉੱਤੇ, ਜੋ ਕਿ ਸਰਵੁਚ ਹੈ, ਈਮਾਨ ਨਹੀਂ ਲਿਆਇਆ ਸੀ।
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Punjabi translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Punjabi by Arif Halim, published by Darussalam

meta.transliteration: innahu kāna lā yu'minu bil-lahi al-ʿaẓīmi
